DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study monitor iris pigmentation change 5-year period patient open-angle glaucoma ocular hypertension . To eligible study , individual must experience iris pigmentation change previously dose TRAVATAN .
DOC.brief_title: Study TRAVATAN Subjects With Iris Pigmentation Changes
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : ï»¿Diagnosis openangle glaucoma ( without pseudoexfoliation pigment dispersion component ) ocular hypertension ; Has experience iris pigmentation change dose TRAVATAN ; Currently dose TRAVATAN ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Exclusion : Any form glaucoma openangle glaucoma ( without pigment dispersion pseudoexfoliation component ) ocular hypertension ; Not currently use TRAVATAN ; Females childbearing potential pregnant , breastfeeding , use highly effective birth control measure ; History severe ocular pathology ( include severe dry eye ) ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
